name: FLOWSHEET_METAEDIT_STRICT
description: Historical third-party metadata (e.g. from Apple's HealthKit) is split across three tables. This table holds category values used to represent keys from each key-value pair. The corresponding key names are held on table FLOWSHEET_METAEDIT_LOOSE, and the values are held on FLOWSHEET_METAEDIT_VAL. Reporting on this metadata can be more easily accomplished by joining these tables on primary key (FSD_ID, GROUP_LINE, VALUE_LINE).

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Flowsheets data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EDITD_3P_META_KEY_C_NAME
columns.description: Within a line, each non-null position represents a key in a dictionary of third-party metadata attached to the historical Flowsheets value with the corresponding line number. Keys are represented with category values, allowing them to be more easily programmed against and indexed. If a key does not have a representative category value, it is left null in this item.
